summary: Verified Solscan API fix and admin API management commands. All 31 backend tests passed (100%). Solscan shows 'upgrade_required' status (free tier limitation), Helius working as fallback for whale transaction data. Admin commands /apikeys, /setapi, /testapi registered in Telegram bot.
passed_tests: Helius API direct test - returns whale transaction data successfully
Telegram bot running and polling for updates
All 31 pytest tests passed including new API status tests

features_verified.solscan_api_status: Shows 'upgrade_required' - API key valid but requires paid tier upgrade at solscan.io
features_verified.helius_fallback: Working correctly - returns whale transaction data when Solscan fails

admin_commands./apikeys: Shows API key status for Solscan and Helius (admin only)
admin_commands./setapi: Allows changing API keys with validation (admin only)

solscan.message: API key valid but requires paid tier upgrade at solscan.io

critical_code_review_comments: Solscan API header correctly changed from 'Authorization' to 'token'
Helius fallback properly implemented in get_whale_transactions()
Admin commands properly check is_admin_user() before execution
context_for_next_testing_agent: Solscan API requires paid tier upgrade - shows 'upgrade_required' status. Helius is working as fallback for whale transaction data. Admin commands /apikeys, /setapi, /testapi are registered and working. All backend APIs functional.

notes.solscan_limitation: Solscan Pro API requires paid tier for account/transfer endpoint. Current key is on free tier. This is expected behavior.
notes.helius_fallback: Helius API is working correctly as fallback and returns whale transaction data
